attributes.action: setup a Royal Commission to fund a multifaith organisation that will foster respect and understanding between our different faith communities of adults and children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have in our country a lack of knowledge and understanding of the different faiths and how they affect all of us, this petition is to fund education of all citizens of all communities onto the different faiths of our country and how they contribute to Britishness.
